name: Butternut squash sauce
author: Pooja
description: This is a creamy butternut squash sauce that tastes delicious over ravioli.

actions.step: Peel butternut squash and scoop out seeds.
Cut into 2 inch chunks. Toss with oil, sage, salt, and pepper.
Scatter unpeeled garlic around squash on baking sheet.
Bake ~40 minutes, until squash is very tender.
Puree/blend squash and garlic, while adding half and half and 1-2 cups of water.
Continue to blend sauce until smooth, adding water if necessary.
Pour sauce over cooked pasta and add toppings as desired.
